sn35.104:1.5: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.104:1.6: Te tathagatassa pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn35.104:1.7: Tesanca pahanaya akkhasi yogam, tasma tathagato ‘yogakkhemi’ti vuccati …pe…
sn35.104:1.8: santi, bhikkhave, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.104:1.9: Te tathagatassa pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn35.104:1.10: Tesanca pahanaya akkhasi yogam, tasma tathagato ‘yogakkhemi’ti vuccati.
